Package logic

Class Sales

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Sales
  • public class Sales
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has all the information of a sale. The information of sale includes: the sale ID, the name of the product participating in the sale, the area in which the sale will take place, the start date and time of the sale, the end date and time of the sale, the original price of the product, the reduced price of the product (after a discount is applied).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sales

        public Sales​(java.lang.String saleID,
             java.lang.String product,
             java.lang.String area,
             java.lang.String startDate,
             java.lang.String endDate,
             java.lang.String originalPrice,
             java.lang.String newPrice)
        This method is the constructor for Sales
        Parameters:
        saleID - - the ID of the sale (the primary key in the DB table of sales)
        product - - the name of the product participating in the sale
        area - - the name of area in which the sale will take place
        startDate - - the start date and time of the sale
        endDate - - the end date and time of the sale
        originalPrice - - the original price of the product
        newPrice - - the reduced price of the product (after a discount is applied)
